idps.title: solid.community
idps.description: solid.community is a public server for early adopters of Solid. It gives you solid storage space, and also a solid identity.

idps.title: solidtest.space
idps.description: solidtest.space is a public test server for solid.  It allows you to obtain solid space, and also provisions you solid identity.

idps.title: databox.me
idps.description: Databox.me is the first Solid-compliant, public and free service on which you can get a WebID and data storage (limited).
